PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2017-03962017-04-13,  IRCC,  ,  , 
ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations (Age of Dependent Children)
PrecisRegulations Amending the IMMIGRATION AND REFUGEE PROTECTION REGULATIONS (AGE OF DEPENDENT CHILDREN) in order to (1) enhance family unity and reunification by enabling Canadians and permanent residents to bring their young adult children between 19 and 21 years of age to Canada; and (2) clarify the policy intent by providing a transitional provision in respect of a dependent child who made an application as a principal applicant for a permanent resident visa as a member of the family class on or before July 31, 2014, and whose application is pending the day on which these Regulations come into force.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2017-0060 Publication Date: 2017-05-03
AttachmentsAttachment
